page.title: 12Employment-Haulage
page.content: One person who has started his own business is Mr.Ewbank of Broad Lea. He started in 1963 and now has three wagons.When he is busiest he employ's upto nine men but most of the time he employ's only two. His wagons do long distance work. Kent being the furthest.He transports sheep,cattle and pigs to be slaughter- ed. He moved out of Long Marton in 1980 to live at Broad Lea because of the space needed for the lorries and also to be away from neighbours because of the noise. As well as the lorries his wife has four cottages which she rents out either for winter lets or as holiday cottages. Another local farmer started his own dairy milk dilivery.
